snippet.title: The Talos Principle 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer | Devolver Digital Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Take a look at gameplay, new puzzle mechanics, new puzzles to solve, and more in this latest trailer for The Talos Principle 2. Set in a distant future where humankind has long been extinct, human culture lives on through interminable robots made in our image. Embarking on a quest to investigate a mysterious megastructure, you will be confronted with questions about the nature of the cosmos, faith versus reason, and the fear of repeating humankind's mistakes. The Talos Principle 2 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X in 2023.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming
